message: I added https://github.com/dashboard/yours to my bookmarks bar, and I think it's going to help a lot. I often forget what I was working on last, and this page shows what I was working on last in both public and private repos.
ooh, the News Feed RSS link is different between News Feed and Your Actions, too: benatkin.private.atom and benatkin.private.actor.atom. Nice!

...and it uses the github token, that changes when the password changes. It's HTTPS and robots protected so it's unlikely to be leaked unintentionally...but if I was using a service to subscribe to the feed and decided not to trust them with it I could easily revoke access to it.
